name: Guilty Transplant (Post-Jam Version)
description:
Post-jam update of my entry for LDJAM 46

Controls:

Interact: Space

Attack: RMB

Move: WASD

Use mouse left click to press buttons

Changelog:

0.1.2 - Fixed a bug where inspecting a corpse with fully expired organs would leave you trapped in them menu.

0.1.3 - Reduced enemy HP to one hit,  reduced number of enemies per wave,  reduced 46's organ expiry rate., added start menu, changed attack input to MRB.
